info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:17AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Kendall, central Will, southeastern DuPage, Cook and northwestern Lake Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 517 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shorewood to near University Park. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Joliet, Naperville, Cicero, Hammond, Gary, Evanston, Bolingbrook, Skokie, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Oak Park, Downers Grove, Elmhurst, Romeoville, Plainfield, Calumet City and Woodridge. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 251 and 294. I-57 between mile markers 332 and 358. I-80 between mile markers 127 and 155. I-88 near mile marker 132, and between mile markers 135 and 140. I-90 between mile markers 82 and 107. I-94 between mile markers 40 and 74. I-290 between mile markers 15 and 29. I-294 between mile markers 40 and 74. I-355 between mile markers 1 and 18, and near mile marker 21. Indiana I-80 between mile markers 1 and 5. Indiana I-90 between mile markers 1 and 12. This includes... Argonne National Laboratory, Brookfield Zoo, Lincoln Park Zoo, Loyola University, Purdue University Northwest Hammond, SeatGeek Stadium, Triton College, University of Chicago, University of St. Francis, Windy City Thunderbolts Baseball, Chicagoland Speedway...Route 66 Raceway, Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre, Governors State University, Hawthorne Park, Joliet Junior College, Joliet Slammers Baseball, Lewis University, Moraine Valley Community College, Northeastern Illinois University, Northwestern University, Prairie State College, Soldier Field, South Suburban College, University of Illinois Chicago, Guaranteed Rate Field...IL Institute of Technology, Wrigley Field, The Loop, Museum of Science and Industry, Museum Campus, and Northerly Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for northeastern Illinois...and northwestern Indiana.
